trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Atlantic City
There were no other sightings in Atlantic City on or around August 15th 2006
Summary: i saw a very large triangle craft
divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking from my car to the entrance of my apt. and i happened to look to my left.appearing to be banking out of a turn was a very large triangle shaped aircraft.it was black but stood out from the night time sky.they have an air show here every year and i know the size of aircrafts from the distance involved.it disappeared behind a condo building that is about twenty stories high.that building is about six blocks away and it went out of sight maybe three quarters up.thing is there are casinos higher than the condo building for about thirty blocks so it had to be beyond them.compared to objects in size from the air show that were probably at a closer distance the black triangle shaped craft was twenty to thirty times larger and probably more if as i suspect it was a couple of miles away.to be clear i saw it clear.it was triangle winged with what appeared like a conventional pilot type area forward.i didn't even tell anyone for a year now i have to reconcile its existance with known physics and philosophy and there is none.it just brings to mind that shakespeare quote something about us being sport to wanton gods as flies are to us.something is out there and i saw it but it is beyond anything i can figure out.
